availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. O. Clark (Pendleton County, Kentucky, constable)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, constable. Virginia native. Married to Sarah C. Clark. Father of James E. Clark, Clarence Clark, Charles W. Clark, and Francis A. Clark. Constable in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 93.
Find A Grave, "John W. O. Clark (November 19, 1829-January 30, 1910)," Memorial #92200976, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92200976 (accessed June 4, 2018).
